videoSnippet.title: It Took Magnus 14 Years to Finally Beat Nepo!
videoSnippet.description:
Nepo vs Carlsen First Ever Game https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8NAcQtrCysk

AGE OF CAISSA aditional stories for everyone to enjoy and explore the lore

You are awesome! :)
Channel: https://t.me/agadmatorChannel
Bar and the Library: https://t.me/BarAndTheLibrary

Photos by Lennart Ootes! (mostly)

Ian Nepomniachtchi vs Magnus Carlsen
World Rapid Championship (2016) (rapid), Doha QAT, rd 14, Dec-28
Caro-Kann Defense: Two Knights Attack (B10)

1. e4 c6 2. Nc3 d5 3. Nf3 de4 4. Ne4 Nf6 5. Nf6 ef6 6. d4 Bd6 7. Be2 O-O 8. O-O Re8 9. c4 Nd7 10. Bd3 Nf8 11. h3 Ng6 12. Qc2 Qa5 13. c5 Bb8 14. Bd2 Qd8 15. Rfe1 Be6 16. Bc4 Nf8 17. Rad1 Bc7 18. Qb3 Bc4 19. Qc4 Qd7 20. b4 Ng6 21. a4 Ne7 22. b5 Nd5 23. bc6 bc6 24. Qa6 g5 25. Nh2 Bh2 26. Kh2 Kg7 27. Kg1 Re1 28. Re1 Rb8 29. Qd3 Rb2 30. a5 h6 31. Bc1 Ra2 32. Bd2 Qb7 33. Re8 Qb2 34. Be1 Nf4 35. Qa6 Qd4 36. Qc8 Ng6 37. Qc6 Ra1 38. Qe4 Qc5 39. Kh2 h5 40. Qe3 Qc6 41. Bc3 Ra4 42. f3 Ra2 43. Kh1 Rc2 44. Be1 Qb5 45. Bg3 h4 46. Bh2 Qb1 47. Bg1 Qf1

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:37 Game Starts!
01:55 Completely New Game!
10:50 Pause The Video!
12:18 Pause The Video 2!
15:05 It Was In This Position
16:00 STANDINGS!!
17:33 Contributions

judgment.name: Inaccuracy
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Qg1 was best.
